channel.title: Making safezone bigger and creating new ones?
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone knew of a TuT or knew how to do this, I want to change the safezone in varrock bank so that it covers the entire city, so varrock in new safe zone. Aswell as I want to change my mod place into a safe zone and a few other places.. :|
